parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the windshield wipers can cause reduced visibility, increasing the risk of accidents, especially during inclement weather conditions.
symptoms: may not turn on at all
or get stuck to one side of the windshield. The wipers may work fine and then suddenly stop
or may start working again after jiggling the wiring/connector at the wiper motor.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive oil consumption can lead to engine damage, increased maintenance costs, and potential accidents due to oil spills on the road.
symptoms: oil leaks without visible signs of leakage

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine stalling can cause accidents, especially if it occurs at high speeds or in heavy traffic, and can lead to costly repairs.
Failure of airbags to deploy in the event of a crash can lead to serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Airbags fail to deploy in a crash
despite the severity of the impact.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of windshield wipers can reduce visibility, especially in rainy or snowy conditions, increasing the risk of accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Sensor Failure (Camshaft and Crankshaft Position Sensors)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of sensors can cause engine stalling, difficulty restarting the engine, and potential accidents.
The failure of the ABS can cause the vehicle to slow down instead of coming to a complete stop, leading to potential accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Resistance when pressing the brake pedal
vehicle slows down but does not come to a complete stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch can cause the vehicle to become stuck in gear, making it difficult or impossible to shift, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: clutch pedal feels soft or spongy.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front brakes can cause the vehicle to lose stopping power, leading to potential accidents or injuries.
symptoms: brake fluid leaking from the front of the vehicle.
